verbs.description: [ARG0: A tranche of new messages between two former FBI agents] [V: reveal] [ARG1: deep antipathy towards Trump from some of the people investigating him — but no proof of a “ deep state ” conspiracy] .

A tranche of new messages between two former FBI agents reveal deep antipathy towards Trump from some of [ARG0: the people] [V: investigating] [ARG1: him] — but no proof of a “ deep state ” conspiracy .
